name: 《述梦》
description:
How To Play

《述梦》is a first-person 3D game that combines word puzzle solving with survival.

You will search for supplies to survive on a cursed island and explore the memories of the dead and free their souls.

Surviving and finding a way to escape the island is the ultimate goal of the game, and you can choose to do so on your own or with the power of your soul.

The game consists of two or four puzzle levels with linear plot and an open large map that hosts everything.

On a large map, you can collect fruits and vegetables to feed your hunger or make medicines with special effects. In addition, there are many reward items and plot hidden in the map, which can be found with careful exploration and a little luck.

Introduction to the game team


《述梦》It's a slow-heat and text-important game, so friends who don't quite accept text expression should be careful to buy it, and it's hard to play without reading text.

The team of three people, are undergraduate game majors in school students. As a result, the project's funding and our technical capacity are limited. You may have insufficient play or even procedural flaws in the course of the game. We will do our best to improve the problems exposed in the game, but there is still the possibility of not meeting your psychological expectations, which you will know.

Whether you decide to support our game or not, we appreciate you reading our introduction to the game. Because it's all a small endorsement of the game in our opinion.

While we're eager for the game to have your support, we'd like to see the quality of the game itself make your purchase decision.

Therefore, if you do not like this game or the game has serious program problems, I hope you can apply for a refund in time. A game that never opens should not remain in your game library.
If you have the opportunity, I hope you will actively present your views on the game in the comments area, any criticism and praise you have is priceless. These experiences will help us produce higher quality works if we are fortunate enough to enter the gaming industry in the future.

Thank you for your patience in reading! We look forward to your love of our work!
